remarks: Relate intersection of two open-below, closed-above intervals with the same upper bound with a conditional construct.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2017.)
statement: iocinif $p |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ C e. RR* ) -> ( ( A (,] C ) i^i ( B (,] C ) ) = if ( A < B , ( B (,] C ) , ( A (,] C ) ) ) $.
